verbose_text: The mammalian thioredoxin system, which consists of NADPH, thioredoxin and thioredoxin reductase, plays an important role in protecting cells from oxidative stress induced apoptosis.
evidence: thioredoxin system, which consists of NADPH, thioredoxin and thioredoxin reductase, plays an important role in protecting cells from oxidative stress-induced apoptosis
